img_summary: The image depicts a scene from a video game where a character, dressed in traditional attire and holding a staff, is standing in a forested area. The environment is lush with greenery and features a large stone sculpture of a face on the left side. The character is facing towards a small structure, possibly a shrine or temple, partially obscured by mist and trees. A red arrow is pointing towards this structure, suggesting it is a point of interest or destination within the game.
